alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Cedar; Delaware; Iowa; Johnson; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:38PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Two lines of thunderstorms capable of producing short lived funnel clouds will affect Jackson...Cedar...Benton...Delaware... Linn...Buchanan...Johnson...Jones...Clinton and Iowa Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 532 PM CDT...Doppler radar indicated two lines of thundertsorms capabale of producing short lived funnel clouds. One extending from just south of Independence, east into southern Delaware County. Another line stretched from Williamsburg to Solon to Wyoming and back towards Clinton Iow. Both of these lines were moving north at around 5 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Cedar Rapids, Iowa City, Clinton, Maquoketa, Independence, Anamosa, Vinton, Manchester, Tipton, Marengo, West Branch, Mechanicsville, Stanwood, Marion, Coralville, North Liberty, Hiawatha, DeWitt, Mount Vernon and Dyersville. Funnel clouds of this nature are short lived and rarely touch the ground. However, if you notice one approaching the ground, move indoors to a place of safety. The National Weather Service will continue to closely monitor the situation. Please forward reports of funnel cloud sightings to the nearest law enforcement agency for relay to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Buchanan; Cedar; Delaware; Iowa; Johnson; Jones; Linn
